article.title: July 2012 Galaxy Update
article.content:
The July 2012 Galaxy Update is now available.

Highlights:

  • GCC2012 is July 25-27!

    • Register by July 18

  • Other Upcoming Events and Deadlines, including these deadlines in the next several days

    • Galaxy Workshops in South Africa (deadline: June 30) and the South African Genetics & Bioinformatics Society Conference (deadline July 1)
    • Systems Bioinformatics Workshop (deadline: June 30)
    • [GMOD Summer School](http://gmod.org/wiki/2012 GMOD Summer School) (deadline: July 9)
  • 31 New Papers, including two new Current Protocols
  • Open Positions at six different institutions
  • Tool Shed Contributions
  • A new CloudMan distribution was released last month

  • Plus

    • Easily wrap your R functions as Galaxy tools
    • help schedule the first GalaxyCzars conference call on July 9 or 10
    • and lots of new screencasts, tutorials, and new genomes on main

If you have anything you would like to see in the August Galaxy Update, please let me know.

Dave Clements
